name: Hardcore mission. The way to nowhere
name_original: Hardcore mission. The way to nowhere
description:
This is the sequel to the Hardcore mission game.The last war.

In this game you have to go through a difficult path through a dying world teeming with various psychos.

If you want to know the plot of the game, then go to the folder where you installed it, there you will find the art narrating the plot, and you will also find there a large image with hints and events of the previous game.

!!!Attention!Do not create a shortcut on the desktop, but run the game through the folder where you installed it!!!!
